title: Second division football leagues in Europe ranked by revenue 2011/12
summary: This is a bar chart representing Football League in the x axis and Income (in million euros) in the y axis.
The Income (in million euros) is highest at Football League Championship (England) and lowest at Football League Segunda Division (Spain).
The difference of Income (in million euros) between the highest and lowest Football League is 389.2.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Income (in million euros) for 5 number of Football Leagues.
The maximum Income (in million euros) 590.3 is found at Football League Championship (England) and the minimum is found at Segunda Division (Spain) where Football League is 201.1.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Football League in the x axis and Income (in million euros) in the y axis.
The Income (in million euros) is highest at Football League Championship (England) and lowest at Football League Segunda Division (Spain).
The difference of Income (in million euros) between the highest and lowest Football League is 389.2.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Income (in million euros) for 5 number of Football Leagues.
The maximum Income (in million euros) 590.3 is found at Football League Championship (England) and the minimum is found at Segunda Division (Spain) where Football League is 201.1.
The difference of Income (in million euros) between the highest and lowest Football League is 389.2.

Football League Championship (England) is higher than any other Football Leagues with value 590.3, followed by 2. Bundesliga (Germany), and Serie B (Italy). Down to Football League Segunda Division (Spain) with the lowest value 201.1.
The Football League Segunda Division (Spain) has 1.8 times less Income (in million euros) than average.
The Income (in million euros) is 1642.3 if we add up values of all Football Leagues.
